column17:
Nurture Chemical Free Panty Liners Pantyliner (Pack of 20) Price: Rs.125

100 percent natural cotton cover to keep you dry comfortable and rash free. Chemical free. Hypo-allergenic. Silver ion Chip- provides Anti-fungal & Anti- Bacterial action. Non-chlorine bleached. Perfume free. Adhesive layer for secure hold. Product Details - Finally a product for all your needs. We at Nurture believe that each day you must feel secure clean and healthy. A product to help you get through every day and every minute naturally! In today's day and age we need a product that is super-absorbent comfortable hypo-allergenic and is pretty. 100% Natural Cotton top-sheet - Cotton is not plastic! Nurture ensures that all body contact surfaces are safe from contact with any synthetic materials that cause itching and rashes. Cotton is naturally breathable. It is nature's most absorbent natural material and keeps you dry and comfortable. Silver ion Chip - provides Anti-fungal and Anti- Bacterial action. Experiments show that silver ion is capable of eliminating 99.9% of bacteria exposed in no more than 1 hr. Since the working woman of today has very little time to change pads during the day silver ion eliminates the bacteria and other pathogens that develop due to moisture. In addition silver is body temperature adjusting and anti-static which would promote good circulation and comfort. Hypoallergenic - A large percentage of women know they have sensitive skin; Nurture is suitable for all skin types. These hypoallergenic pads are irritation free because of the breathable qualities of 100% cotton. That means no more itching even for those with sensitive skin. Chlorine Free - Chlorine Free Pads means we don't use chlorine bleaching to whiten and disinfect the raw materials used to make Nurture sanitary pads. This makes these sanitary napkins dioxin free keeping away known carcinogens from our most intimate body parts. Widest Fan Shape Back - To prevent leakages through the day and that extra protection at night. Ph Compatible. Itch free. Soft and breathable. So comfortable that it moves with you- thanks to the dynamic pad design. Synthetic-surface Free: For a Softer Irritation Free Plastic-less feel and Real Breathable Cotton Experience. Fragrance Free - All of our menstrual pads are fragrance free to help prevent the risk of irritation. Individually Wrapped: For your health safety and carrying convenience. Leakage Control Channels: Help direct liquid to the center of the pad to protect against leaks. Liquid-Locking Absorbent Core - Secures against leaks
